system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 1st-level, your archetype spells are selected from one of several lists, chosen from below. Your choice of archetype spell list affects other features from this archetype.

Table: Storm Priest Spells

1@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ak4r2o5c5mrme5vk]{Feather Fall}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.65ksar78lxxp7uol]{Thunderwave}
3@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.8rsevg8q1eygarlk]{Gust of Wind}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.7e9cvnpmbg3knm9l]{Shatter}
5@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.idachh0qpbbyne7c]{Lightning Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.n7v09ab1hwk8cupe]{Wind Wall}
7@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pdvg7c9emjgnib07]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.y1fweqznq2s00isd]{Conjure Minor Elementals} (air only)
9@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.633bpp281x35cz6t]{Conjure Elemental} (air only), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.tmhbscn1twt2yghy]{Storm Kick}
